name: Milkey Trip
description:
A Jame Gam #2 Submission Theme:  The More You Get The More It Gets Harder. Special Feature: Power Source. Idea:

You are playing as  Milkey in this game a milk charachter that wants to avoid orange juice and get back to his milk bottle , But Milkey has a Concuming date, the player will be dying slowly because of not being in the freezer.

Features:
  • The More You Get The More Milkey Gets Tried : That Means  Milkey is going to be dying slowly and losing his speed and his jump force over the time .
  • Fresh Milk : A power Source  that will give you a percentage of milk and give  you some extra time to not die quikly
  • Orange Juice:  Enemies that will take away some milk percentage
  • Spikes: You know what these are, right ?
Goal:

You will start at 40% of milk, gain milk and reach the bottle with at least 60% milk and before being 70% poisened because of your concuming date.

Have Fun ...
